Â Â Â Â [2024-09-23]Â Our papers "HFH-Font: Few-shot Chinese Font Synthesis with Higher Quality, Faster Speed, and Higher Resolution" and "Pano2Room: Novel View Synthesis from a Single Indoor Panorama" have been accepted by SIGGRAPH Asia 2024 Â Â Â Â [2024-09-23]Â Our paper "UDiffText: A Unified Framework for High-quality Text Synthesis in Arbitrary Images via Character-aware Diffusion Models" has been accepted by ECCV 2024 Representative Works: Canonical Forms for Non-rigid 3D Shape Retrieval (IJCV 2013, 3DOR 2017) 3D Shape Measures (rectilinearity, convexity) (IJCV 2010, CVPR 2012) 3D Shape Retrieval Contest (SHREC) (IJCV 2016, PR 2013(ESI Highly Cited Paper) , 3DOR 2015, 14, 11, 10) Aesthetic Assessment and Font Recognition for Chinese Characters (CVPR 2017, IJCAI 2015) Generation of Chinese Fonts (www.flexifont.com, SIGGRAPH (TOG) 19, 20, SIGGRAPH ASIA (TOG) 19) Texture Transfer and Text Effects Transfer (CVPR 18, 19, 20) Bio: I was graduated from School of Automation Science and Electrical Engineering, Beihang University in Sep. 2011 with Ph.D. From Jan. 2008 to Jan. 2009, supported by the China Scholarship Council (CSC), I visited School of Computer Science, Cardiff University, UK as a visiting scholar. Then, I worked as a Guest Researcher at the Information Technology Lab (ITL), National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST), U.S. from Jul. 2009 to Jul. 2011. After that, I came back to China and worked as a postdoctoral researcher at ICST, Peking University, where I became an Assistant Professor in Jun. 2013 and was promoted to Associate Professor in Aug. 2015. Education: 09/2005~06/2011  Ph.D., School of Automation Science and Electrical Engineering, Beihang University, Beijing, China. 09/2001~07/2005  B.Eng., College of Automation Engineering, Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics, Nanjing, China. More specifically, we have been working on the following topics in the last few years: (1) Font Synthesis; (2) Text Image Analysis and Synthesis; (3) 3D Content Generation. I was the principal investigator of several projects funded by the National Natural Science Foundation of China, Beijing Nova Program of Science and Technology, etc., and have led our group to successfully develop practical systems for the generation of Chinese fonts. These systems and techniques related to computer fonts have been adopted by a company called Founder Handwriting since 2016 to create font products that have served millions of users, making significant social and economic benefits.
